p: FTIR spectra of the medicinal honeys were scanned using A MIRacleTM ZnSe single reflection ATR plate-linked spectrometer (Perkin Elmer, Norwalk, CT, USA). An amount of 0.2 g of honeys was placed onto the measuring plate and measured for 40 scans from 4000 to 500 cm −1, 4 cm −1 resolution at room temperature.
